import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import $ from 'jquery' const UserLogin = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const[userData, setUserData] = useState([]) function openUserPage(){ //CHECKING THE CREDINTIALS var userEmail = document.getElementById("userEmail").value; var userPassword = document.getElementById("userPassword").value; axios.get("http://localhost:300/UserDetailsControllerImpl/getUserDetailsByEmailAndPassword/email/"+userEmail+"/password/"+userPassword) .then(resp => setUserData(resp.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) alert() } return (
Remember me
Forgot Password?

Don't hav an account? Register
) } export default UserLogin
